QuestData.Title: Doesn't Hold Water
QuestData.Description: Would you mind checking in on Mudmug? He may need some assistance bringing that water back.$b$bI'm sure he'll appreciate the help of a big, strong $c like yourself to help him shoulder the load.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Mudmug at the Gilded Fan in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Mudmug at the Gilded Fan in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: $n! You here to help out? That's mighty swell of you.
